Text: Thank you See Notice Belowjust received the package of master agreements you asked Genia to send me Thank you so much I have some thoughts about an approach to a simple master and will look through these documents over the next weeks to see if I think the approach will work Please let me know if there is anything I can do to help you I am asking my secretary to send you a copy of the recent supplement to Documentation for Derivatives on crossproduct risk management that Tony and I just published in case it is of interest Notice This email message is confidential intended only for the named recipients above and may contain information that is privileged attorney work product or exempt from disclosure under applicable law If you have received this message in error or are not the named recipients please immediately notify the sender at and delete this email message from your computer Thank you
